name: ClawMegaUltra
description:
ClawMega has been completely rebuilt so it could be improved!

better . . .

performance / graphics / music

more . . .

modes / toys / everything

  • Challenge yourself in 3 different modes
  • Grab 30+ toys
  • Shop to unlock new toy packs
  • Shop to upgrade toy values
  • Gallery with descriptions and stats for every toy
  • One toy get = one powerup use

Classic Mode

  • Machine refill
  • 3 average-strength claws
  • No cost to use
  • Standard toy reward

Empty Mode

  • No machine refill, but rather a set of toys to clear out of the machine
  • 4 weak claws
  • No cost to use
  • Increased one-time reward upon completion

Mega Mode

  • Machine refill
  • 2 strong claws
  • Cost per-use
  • Increased toy reward

Addicted to crane games?

You waste use less money playing a crane video game!
